text: This attribute represents the text that is written in this button
color: This attribute represents the color of this button
animated: This attribute is for what this button be animated
onClick: This function is called when you click this button

text: This attribute represents the text that is written in this alert box
color: This attribute represent the color of this alert
fade: This attribute is for when the alert be spawn, this have a fade effect
timeout: This attribute is for the timeout for the fade effect

Card.code: <Card text={['Title', 'Hello world', 'Description', 'This is a test description', 'Date', '09/09/2011 19:26']} />

text: This attribute is for the card content the size of the array is 5
href: This attribute is for if you want to link the card to other page
color: This attribute is the color of this card
image: This attribute is for the card background

text: This attribute is for the content of this label

Modal.code:
{this.modal = node}} text={

Hello world

} />,

text: This attribute is the content for this modal
open: This is a function that opens the modal
close: This is a function that closes the modal
big: This attribute is for if you want this modal be big
onOpen: This attribute is a event that be executed when the modal be loaded
onClose: This attribute is a event that be executed when the modal be closed
clickLeft: This attribute is for when you click left the modal this be closed

current: This attribute is for the current value of this progress bar
max: This attribute is for the maximum value of this progress bar
min: This attribute is for the minimum value of this progress bar
color: This attribute is for the color of this progress bar
percent: This attribute is for if you want to see the percent in the tooltip of this progress bar

options: This attribute is for this Selector options
color: This attribute is for this Selector color
onChange: This attribute is a event that be executed when the selector options be changed

dataOn: This attribute is the label when the switch be on
dataOff: This attribute is tha label when the switch be off
onClick: This attribute is a event that be executed when the switch be clicked
onOn: This attribute is a event that be executed when the switch be switched to on
onOff: This attribute is a event that be executed when the switch be switched to off

text: This attribute is the text unhidden
hidden: This attribute is the text hidden for this tooltip
